channel.title: Captions and Subtitles does not work for Simplified Chinese
channel.description:
Actually I cannot tell if this is an issue or rather a help request... Posted it on BM International but I suppose maybe I should post it here to technically solve the problem?
I set my Steam language to Simplified Chinese, re-named my WIP txt files into bms_schinese.txt and closecaption_schinese.txt, then entered the game... At first in the menu the UI seems fine. However, when in-game, the subtitles doesn't show up. And the only stuff that works is corrupted as follows:
![](upload://hUUiKvbaKLZccvNDV6iAp7cKeXj.jpeg)
I'm pretty sure that I saved the file in UCS-2 Little Endian format, the same as used in hl2_schinese.txt and its closed caption. So, is this an issue? If not, any idea how to make BM work with Chinese characters?
Thanks in advance :wink:
